field.label: Reverse domain
field.help: Reverse DDNS domain (e.g. 0.168.192.in-addr.arpa. or ip6.arpa. variant)

field.label: TSIG key
field.help: Select an optional TSIG key to authenticate updates for this reverse zone. Note: if a DNS server has a TSIG key configured, that server-specific key takes precedence over the domain key.

field.label: DNS servers
field.help: Select one or more shared DNS servers to update for this reverse zone.
